mapper.sql: id, tenant_id, tenant_name, level, officer, telephone, officephone, is_delete, imageurl, address, longitude,latitude,create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time
mapper.update: update t_tenant set is_delete=1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.update:
update t_tenant
tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tenant_name = #{tenantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
officer = #{officer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
officephone = #{officephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
imageurl = #{imageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_tenant set tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tenant_name = #{tenantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, officer = #{officer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, officephone = #{officephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, imageurl = #{imageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from t_tenant t where tenant_id=#{tenantId}
update t_tenant set is_delete=1 where tenant_id=#{tenantId}
select count(*) from t_tenant where is_delete=0
select tenant_code from t_tenant_codes where tenant_id=#{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id from t_tenant order by id desc limit 1;
select t.id,t.tenant_id from t_tenant t where t.is_delete=0
